text: The Final Payment is a 1917 American silent drama film directed by Frank Powell and starring Nance O'Neil, Jane Miller and Clifford Bruce.Solomon p.240 ==Cast== * Nance O'Neil as Nina * Jane Miller as Rose, Her Sister * Clifford Bruce as Cesare * Leslie Austin as Neccola * Alfred Hickman as Alfredo * Dorothy Bernard as Marie ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography. McFarland, 2011. ==External links== * Category:1917 films Category:1917 drama films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American drama films Category:American black- and-white films Category:Films directed by Frank Powell Category:Fox Film films
title: The Final Payment
